title: बांग्लादेश के रेलवे स्टेशन में तोड़फोड़ का पुराना वीडियो कोलकाता का बताकर शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: This scene from Kolkata, these are Bangladesh Refugees, they don’t have any citizenship, if they dare to do this even without citizenship what happens after giving them Citizenship, God bless our Country 🙏🏼
